Cranston.Potter\u2013Remington House: The Potter–Remingston House is an historic house just east of 571 Natick Road in Cranston, Rhode Island. It is a ​2 1⁄2-story wood-frame structure, five bays wide, with a large central chimney, and a two-story ell attached to the west side. It is set on what was originally a 21-acre (8.5 ha) parcel of rolling woods and overgrown fields, adjacent to the Remington family cemetery.
